FAQ_PAGE.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ_PAGE.BOOKING_QUESTION: How do I reserve my spot in the parking lot?
FAQ_PAGE.BOOKING_ANSWER: Access is managed via subscription or prior registration. Contact us for access details to our private parking.
FAQ_PAGE.SECURITY_ANSWER: Yes, our private parking is equipped with 24/7 surveillance cameras, access control via license plate recognition, and on-site presence to ensure security.
FAQ_PAGE.HOURS_ANSWER: The parking is accessible 24 hours a day, 7 days a week for authorized and registered users.
FAQ_PAGE.PAYMENT_ANSWER: We offer subscription plans tailored to your needs for access to our private parking. Contact us for pricing details.
FAQ_PAGE.PLATE_ISSUE_QUESTION: What if my license plate is not recognized?
FAQ_PAGE.PLATE_ISSUE_ANSWER: If there is an issue with plate recognition at the entrance or exit, a call button will connect you with our support for immediate assistance.

LOCATION_MAP.TITLE: Our Unique Location
LOCATION_MAP.DIRECTIONS_HINT: Use the map above to get directions.
LOCATION_MAP.ERROR_TOKEN: Mapbox access token is not configured. The map cannot be displayed.

PRICING_PAGE.TITLE: Our Subscription Plans
PRICING_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Choose the access plan for our private parking that suits you.

SECTION_1.TITLE: Application Publisher (FYP Project)
SECTION_1.CONTENT: Parkiny application developed as part of a Final Year Project. Contact: [Student Name(s)], [Student Email(s)], [University/School]

SECTION_2.TITLE: Hosting (Simulated)
SECTION_2.CONTENT: The application is hosted locally for development and FYP demonstration purposes.

SECTION_3.TITLE: Intellectual Property
SECTION_3.CONTENT: The source code and graphic elements of this application are the intellectual property of the FYP authors, unless otherwise stated (third-party libraries). Any reproduction is prohibited without authorization.

SECTION_4.TITLE: Limitation of Liability
SECTION_4.CONTENT: This application is an FYP prototype. Information and features are provided for indicative and demonstration purposes only. The authors cannot be held responsible for any errors or unavailability.

SECTION_5.TITLE: Applicable Law
SECTION_5.CONTENT: This project is subject to the regulatory framework of the educational institution [University/School].

SECTION_1.TITLE: Introduction
SECTION_1.CONTENT: This policy describes how data is managed within the Parkiny prototype (FYP). No real personal data is collected or stored long-term in this demonstration version.

SECTION_2.TITLE: Data Collected (Simulation)
SECTION_2.CONTENT: For demonstration purposes, the application simulates the collection of: username, email, vehicle information (license plate), and reservation/subscription data. Plate images are processed locally and not stored.

SECTION_3.TITLE: Use of Data (Simulation)
SECTION_3.CONTENT: Simulated data is used solely to demonstrate features: authentication, access management, display of reservations/subscriptions.

SECTION_4.TITLE: Data Sharing
SECTION_4.CONTENT: No data, even simulated, is shared with third parties as part of this FYP.

SECTION_5.TITLE: Data Security
SECTION_5.CONTENT: Standard security measures are implemented (e.g., simulated password hashing), but the application remains a prototype not intended for a production environment.

SECTION_6.TITLE: User Rights (Simulation)
SECTION_6.CONTENT: In a real application, users would have rights to access, rectify, and delete their data. These features are not implemented in this FYP.

SECTION_7.TITLE: Cookies
SECTION_7.CONTENT: The application uses technical cookies (e.g., authentication token) necessary for its operation. No tracking or advertising cookies are used.

SECTION_8.TITLE: Contact
SECTION_8.CONTENT: For any questions regarding this FYP prototype, contact the authors: [Student Email(s)]

FOOTER.ABOUT_TEXT: Management solution for a unique private parking. Final Year Project.
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: All rights reserved (within the scope of the FYP).
